name: Mogu
description:
A complex puzzle game where you have to flip, rotate, and push yourself in all sorts of new directions. Approach each gravity-bending challenge with a new perspective, and be careful not to lose track of which way is up!

Keyboard
  • Movement: Arrow keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Interact: Z and X
  • Undo: F
  • Restart: R
Controller
  • Movement: Left control stick
  • Jump: A
  • Interact:  Left and right bumper
  • Undo: X
  • Restart: Right Trigger
Credits Mushroom Stewdios
  • Max Froehlich
  • Scott Smith
  • Robert Keller
  • Lawrence Bitzer
  • Michelle Zhang
Other Contributors

  • Andrew Varghese (Music)
  • Antoni Alvarez (Art)
